title: [Large-scale] High-Structured Active Learning Design for Enhancing STEM Education Pathway Persistence

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science/math knowledge and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Instructional design combining high-structure active learning and digital analytics tools to address learning disengagement in large-scale lecture environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose self-directed learning patterns by analyzing LMS (Learning Management System) data with over 80% accuracy
Learners can document STEM problem-solving processes with a 75% or higher completion rate in project-based assessments and incorporate feedback
Learners track participation data on a 4-week cycle, revise at least three personalized learning strategies, and improve academic persistence by over 20%.

resources: Automated Grading System for Formative Assessments

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
